name: Kill Zombie Gore Sandbox
description:
The most goriest ragdoll sandbox. Just have fun with this game. You can add a photo from your gallery of someone`s face on zombie face, kill zombie with multiple weapons, cut off his head, arms, legs, pop out his eyes, choose you background from your gallery, and a lot of other things.

It will be amazing if someone will help me in situation that im in right now. I will be happy with 1 dollar if you can donate me. I have trouble in life so im collecting 3000 dollars to solve it. If game lagging turn on optimization in settings there will be a button

And yea have fun with this game (૭◕U◕)૭
